Title: Add PrepareStep consent/recording gate UI
Acceptance: Toggle + patient state + consent status + privacy + engine decision shown; decline path available

Title: Implement local recording policy engine
Acceptance: Policy JSON loaded; outputs ALLOW/WARN/BLOCK + reason codes; unit tests cover key cases

Title: Implement on-device audio recorder w/ encrypted chunk storage
Acceptance: Audio-only capture works; chunks encrypted; no plaintext audio on disk

Title: Implement destruction certificate + key shredding
Acceptance: Auto-destroy after note generation event; certificate saved; failure -> quarantine

Title: Create patient feature store (structured-only)
Acceptance: Per-patient timeline updates on note save; rolling windows computed

Title: Add inconsistency detectors
Acceptance: Flags contradictions across sessions; each flag includes evidence fields

Title: Add trajectory summaries (symptom/intervention trends)
Acceptance: Outputs trend cards with time window + evidence; no raw text use

Title: Hypothesis engine v1 (rules)
Acceptance: Ranked suggestions with confidence + why + suggested next step; clinician accept/reject

Title: LLM phrasing service (JSON-only contract)
Acceptance: Given structured evidence JSON, returns short rationale text; schema validation blocks raw text

Title: Fix INSTALL.md and add provider readiness panel
Acceptance: No ellipses; copy/paste steps; UI shows AI provider status
